title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 26 April 2017 - XWiki
content:

09:34 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <DarkKnightCZ> Hi, was there any change in tmp dir handling? I'm currently getting Tomcat 403 (Access to the specified resource has been forbidden) for /xwiki/tmp/officeviewer/ context paths on 9.1.2 as a user that has access to that required resources. Thanks  
09:43 <VincentMassol[m]> DarkKnightCZ: I don't remember any recent change (I mean not in the past few years)  
09:47 <DarkKnightCZ> VincentMassol[m]: hmm, it was definitely working on8.x version and there weren't any changes in tomcat settings (and actually the /xwiki/tmp was treated as cache for some reason, so that must have changed recently)  
09:48 <DarkKnightCZ> and seems it's same as XWIKI-14176  
09:59 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
10:58 <VincentMassol[m]> (in meeting)

15:07 <Jan\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:08 <Jan\_\_> Greetings!  
15:08 <pbondoerffer[m]> good day  
15:09 <Jan\_\_> Would someone have the kindness guiding me through the installation process of the LDAP extension? I have a fresh installation on Ubuntu 16.10 with tomcat7. After the installation of the extension, it appears nowhere  
15:16 <Jan\_\_> Hello, is it the right place here to ask a little support question?

17:11 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:12 <floflobel> Hi, how i can flush the cache of color theme ?  
17:25 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
17:29 <sorinello> has quit  
17:41 <sorinello> has quit  
17:48 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
18:15 <gdelhumeau> floflobel: $services.lesscss.clearCache()  
18:15 <gdelhumeau> you need programing rights  
18:16 <gdelhumeau> otherwise just re-save thecolor theme  
18:16 <mflorea> has quit  
18:23 <Slashman> gdelhumeau: what do you mean by $services.lesscss.clearCache() ? care to elaborate where it is? (I'm also interested)  
19:14 <Enygma`> Slashman: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LESS%20Module#HCleaning
